summary.span: 命名空间提供一个围绕 Microsoft Active Directory 服务任务构建的高级别抽象对象模型。

span.span: The namespace provides a high level abstraction object model that builds around Microsoft Active Directory services tasks.

summary.span: Active Directory 服务概念（例如，林、域、站点、子网、分区和架构）是此对象模型的一部分。

span.span: The Active Directory service concepts such as forest, domain, site, subnet, partition, and schema are part of the object model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间用于自动执行 Active Directory 管理任务。The namespace is used to automate Active Directory management tasks. 不用于访问位于 Active Directory 或任何其他目录服务内的数据。 is not used to access data that resides within Active Directory or any other directory service. 命名空间应将用于此目的。The namespace should be used for this purpose. 命名空间可专供熟悉使用 Visual Basic .NET 或 C# 进行 .NET Framework 编程的应用程序开发人员使用。The namespace is intended for use by application developers who are familiar with .NET Framework programming using Visual Basic .NET or C#. 有关目录服务编程的知识也是有帮助的。Knowledge of directory services programming is also helpful. 是的一部分[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]和在任何操作系统上支持的[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]与兼容。 is part of [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] and is supported on any operating system that [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] is compatible with. 类、 方法和属性中的许多命名空间使用代码访问安全选项。Many of the classes, methods, and properties in the namespace use the code access security option. 这意味着代码访问安全性要求仅发生在实时编译过程，并且仅在调用程序集和不在整个调用堆栈中向上执行该要求。This means that the code access security demand only occurs during just-in- time compilation and that the demand is performed only on the calling assembly and not up the entire call stack. 因此，调用方不应传递到不受信任的代码从此命名空间在运行时创建的对象。Because of this, callers should not pass objects created from this namespace at runtime to untrusted code.
